About Me

I'm a full-stack web developer with an interest in security and fintech.
I'm always learning, working to improve my skills, and looking for new problems to solve.
I'm at my best when I'm working on an interesting challenge.


Projects


SchoolMe

Provides web-based tools to assist school administrators in managing, tracking, and analyzing student data, and connects students that need financial assistance to the donors who want to support them.
